product.text:
No Mail for Mitchell
by Catherine Siracusa

 

Mitchell happily delivers everyone’s mail in all kinds of weather. But the hardworking mailman never seems to get any mail himself. Poor Mitchell! Will anything make him feel better? This sweet story, written and illustrated by Catherine Siracusa, just might inspire readers to drop a note to someone they care about—because who doesn’t love receiving mail?

Tie-in Activity: You don’t have to read or write to receive mail! Have your child draw a picture or write a few words to someone special, then help your child address, stamp, and mail the letter. He’ll make someone’s day, and likely get some mail of his own in return.
